message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm thinking of selling it to you for $180. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $120. Would you consider lowering the price to $150?
I understand you're looking to keep your spending within $120, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $165. Would you be interested in that price?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. However, I still aim to stay within my budget. Could we possibly negotiate down to $155?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $155, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we try $170?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly settle at $160?
I'm getting closer to my minimum price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $165, but I need to get a bit closer to my target. How about we try $168?
I appreciate your efforts to meet my budget, Alice. Considering your last offer, could we possibly agree on $165?
I'm not willing to go back to $165, Bob. I'm going to try to meet you in the middle one last time. How about we try $169?
Thank you for your offers, Alice. I really appreciate your efforts. Considering everything, could we possibly agree on $167?
